resources.string: Help and FAQ
Dialer
Select which contact groups will be displayed on Pebble
Displayed contact groups
Skip filtering in groups
Should dialer skip filtering when you pick group instead of all contacts
Call screen
Popup call notification on incoming call

Automatically display call notification on your Pebble when call comes. Disabling this effectively disables call notification, but you can still answer call or perform other actions by opening Dialer manually.
Popup call notification on outgoing call
Automatically display call notification on your Pebble when you call someone. Even when disabled, you can still hangup call or perform other actions by opening Dialer manually.
Close to last app
When call ends, close to last used app on Pebble. NEEDS DEVELOPER CONNECTION ENABLED INSIDE PEBBLE APP!
Root mode
Check this if some in-call features (like answer or mic mute) do not work for you. NEEDS ROOT!
Turn on light on call
Should I turn backlight on when you receive a call?
Show call timer
Show call timer when call is established. Disabling this can improve watch\'s battery life on longer calls.
Do not vibrate when charging
Display caller image
Display image of the caller on the watch. Only for Pebble Time.
Show caller name at the bottom
Display caller name at the bottom instead of in the center when image is displayed to not cover caller\'s face in the middle of the image.
Call screen buttons
Set what buttons on Pebble do on call screen.
UP button press while ringing
Action that will be performing when you press UP button on Pebble while there is incoming call.
Action that will be performing when you press SELECT button on Pebble while there is incoming call.
SELECT button press while ringing
DOWN button press while ringing
Action that will be performing when you press DOWN button on Pebble while there is incoming call.
UP button hold when ringing
Action that will be performing when you hold UP button on Pebble while there is incoming call.
SELECT button hold when ringing
Action that will be performing when you hold SELECT button on Pebble while there is incoming call.
DOWN button hold when ringing
Action that will be performing when you hold DOWN button on Pebble while there is incoming call.
Shake when ringing
Action that will be performing when you shake your Pebble while there is incoming call.
UP button press while call is established
Action that will be performing when you press UP button on Pebble while there is call established.
SELECT button press while call is established
Action that will be performing when you press SELECT button on Pebble while there is call established.
DOWN button press while call is established
Action that will be performing when you press DOWN button on Pebble while there is call established.
UP button hold when call is established
Action that will be performing when you hold UP button on Pebble while there is call established.
SELECT button hold when call is established
Action that will be performing when you hold SELECT button on Pebble while there is call established.
DOWN button hold when call is established
Action that will be performing when you hold DOWN button on Pebble while there is call established.
Shake when call is established
Action that will be performing when you shake your Pebble while there is call established.
Fonts
Timer font
Caller name font
Caller number type font
Caller number font
Canned Responses
Here you can define list of canned responses that you can send as SMS when declining a call.
Writing Phrases

When writing messages on your Pebble you can type letter-by-letter or you can paste whole phrases in. Here you define which phrases will be available to you (You can define up to 19 phrases. Every phrase is limited to 17 characters).
Enable Pebble Time voice reply
When this setting is enabled, you can dictate SMS using microphone on Pebble Time (does not work for regular Pebble)
Enable phone voice reply
When this setting is enabled, you can dictate SMS using microphone on the phone or one connected to the phone (BT headset for example).
Enable SMS Writing
When this setting is enabled, you can write SMS from scratch on the Pebble.
Notification answer
Enable notification service
Notification answer function allows you to gain rootless answer/decline ability by hooking into call notification. Use help option above for more info.
Answer button text
Decline button text
Enable logging to PebbleDialer\\log.txt. Use when debugging.
Open source Licenses
Installed version
Enable debug logging
Donate
Buy me a Coke if you really like my app!
